comments.html:
Really good read. I'm currently studying for the ENARSI myself, recently having failed an attempt.

Might try setting up a small blog for my continued studying.
comments.name: Magnus

comments.html: Timely post! I am in the early days of my networking journey and I have just begun to dip my toes into publishing blog posts to document my learning and help others. Thank you for your encouraging words and advice!
comments.name: Conrad
